short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neutralizer changes the periphrasis 'he or she' and other binary gendered periphrasis like 'his or her' to 'they' and 'their'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neutralizer changes the periphrasis 'he or she' and other similar binary-gendered periphrases like 'his or her', 's/he', and 'her or him' to 'they', 'their' and 'them' on every website.

By replacing these redundant periphrases, websites will become more legible, and it brings us one step closer to deconstructing the gender binary.
